article.headline: Houston 69, SMU 47
article.story: HOUSTON (AP) -- Robert McIver scored 21 points for Houston, which jumped out to a huge first-half lead and defeated Southern Methodist 69-47 on Saturday night. Kelvin Lewis added 11 points for the Cougars (19-5, 8-2 Conference USA), who led 41-18 at halftime. Dion Dowell grabbed eight rebounds to go along with his seven points. Bamba Fall, who was 7 of 8 from the field, had 16 points to lead SMU (8-15, 2-8). Houston never trailed. The Mustangs shot 35 percent from the field, just 28 percent during the first half. SMU hit just 3 of 18 shots beyond the 3-point arc -- 17 percent.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
